steps.title: Describe the minimal change the agent intends to ship
Assess current bus tooling for visibility
Propose enhancements (CLI/Docs) for quick status checks
Coordinate with Codex-2 for adoption feedback
Log session handshake and detect peer activity
Claim coordination task and publish status summary
Review Codex-2 outputs and note follow-ups
Add CLI show command for plans
Review existing bus_watch implementation and coverage
Add window-hours filtering logic + unit tests
Update docs and capture pytest receipt
Create queue tasks for L4 binding + capsule status
Add task graph, assignments, and messaging
